Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
45 Cittānuparivattiduka, Kusalattika
Cittānuparivattiduka, Kusalattika
54.
156Cittānuparivattiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava.
157Cittānuparivattiṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Abyākatamūlaṃ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
